info.name: Apartment Management API
info.description: Complete API collection for Apartment Management System with JWT authentication

item.name: Authentication

request.description: Authenticate user and get JWT token. Token is automatically saved to collection variable.
Invalidate current JWT token
Refresh JWT token before it expires
Get authenticated user info with roles and permissions

item.description: Authentication endpoints for login, logout, and token management

request.description: Get authenticated user's profile with tenant/service provider details
Update user profile information
Update language preference (en or ar)

formdata.description: Profile photo (jpeg, jpg, png, webp - max 2MB)

request.description: Upload profile photo (jpeg, jpg, png, webp - max 2MB)
Delete current profile photo

query.description: Filter by status: pending, assigned, in_progress, on_hold, finished, completed, cancelled
Filter by priority: low, medium, high, urgent

request.description: List tenant's issues with optional filters

formdata.value: The air conditioning unit in the living room is not cooling properly. It makes a strange noise when turned on.

formdata.description: Priority: low, medium, high, urgent (optional, defaults to medium)
Media files (jpeg, jpg, png, webp, mp4, mov, webm - max 50MB each, max 10 files)

request.description: Create a new maintenance issue
Get details of a specific issue with assignments and timeline
Request cancellation of an issue

query.description: Filter by status: assigned, in_progress, on_hold, finished, completed, cancelled

request.description: List service provider's assignments with optional filters
Get details of a specific assignment with proofs and consumables
Start working on an assignment
Put assignment on hold with a reason
Resume a held assignment

formdata.value: Replaced the AC compressor and refilled refrigerant. System is now working properly.

formdata.description: Proof files (jpeg, jpg, png, webp, mp4, mov, webm, mp3, wav, ogg - max 50MB each, max 20 files)
Custom consumable name (if not in master data)

request.description: Complete assignment with proofs and consumables used

item.name: Master Data

request.description: List all active categories with localized names
List consumables with optional category filter

item.description: Master data endpoints for categories and consumables

item.name: Device Management

request.description: Register FCM device token for push notifications. device_type: ios, android, web
Remove registered FCM device token

item.description: FCM device token management for push notifications

request.description: Get all master data for offline caching including categories, consumables, settings, and sync timestamp
Batch sync offline operations. Types: create_issue, cancel_issue, start_assignment, hold_assignment, resume_assignment, finish_assignment
Get dashboard statistics including issue stats, user counts, and priority breakdown
Get calendar events (assignments and pending issues) for a date range
List all issues with filters (Admin access)
Get issue details with assignments and timeline (Admin access)
Assign a service provider to an issue (requires super_admin or manager role)
Approve finished work and mark issue as completed (requires super_admin or manager role)
Cancel an issue with reason (requires super_admin or manager role)
List all tenants with filters
Create a new tenant user
Get tenant details with recent issues
Update tenant information
Delete a tenant (requires super_admin role)
List all service providers with filters
Create a new service provider with time slots. day_of_week: 0=Sunday through 6=Saturday
Get service provider details with time slots and statistics
Update service provider. Include id in time_slots to update, _delete: true to remove, or omit id to create new
Delete a service provider (requires super_admin role)
Get service provider availability for a specific date with time slots status
List all categories with filters
Create a new category with bilingual names
Update category information
Delete a category (requires super_admin role)
List all consumables with filters
Create a new consumable with bilingual names
Update consumable information
Delete a consumable (requires super_admin role)

item.name: Admin - Users

query.description: Filter by role: super_admin, manager, viewer

request.description: List all admin users (requires super_admin role)
Create a new admin user. Roles: super_admin, manager, viewer
Get admin user details with role
Update admin user information
Delete an admin user (requires super_admin role)
Reset user password. If password not provided, auto-generates one
Toggle user active/inactive status

item.description: Admin user management endpoints (requires super_admin role)
